newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Coke Enterprises 1997 EPS.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Coke Enterprises 1997 EPS.

text.p: UBS Securities raised its 1997 earnings estimate for Coca-Cola Enterprises Inc on Tuesday after the Atlanta-based bottler reported a smaller than expected first-quarter loss.

Anton Brenner, who rates the stock a buy, said he raised his projection by a nickel to $1.05 per share for this year. He said the company could see good sustainable volume in the United States during the period, with the possibility of stronger volume in Europe.
"The results were extremely good. The volume was very good and interest expense was lower than expected," he said.
